snippet: Andrew Zucker, the son of Jeff Zucker, president of CNN, resigned from a board that advises the Newark mayor’s Internet venture.
abstract: Andrew Zucker, 15-year-old son of CNN president Jeff Zucker, resigns from board that advises Internet start-up Waywire, founded by Newark Mayor Cory A Booker; goal of Booker's site is to make it easier to collect, curate and share videos from the Web.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Zucker, the son of Jeff Zucker, president of CNN, resigned from a board that advises the Newark mayor’s Internet venture.

headline.main: Boy, 15, Quits Board Tied to Booker Start-Up
headline.print_headline: Boy, 15, Quits Board Tied to Booker Start-Up
